I'm looking for a Doctoral Researcher (PhD student) to work with me on simulation-based inference at Data Science Research Centre, Tampere University. You can find out more [here](https://tuni.rekrytointi.com/paikat/?o=A_A&jid=2782). The application deadline is October 10th.
